definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: And as some spake of the temple, how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts, he said
sentences.chinese: 有人談論聖殿，是用美石和供物妝飾的。

sentences.english: The landscape in Guilin is characterized by its "green hills, clear waters, pretty rocks, and grotesque caves".
sentences.chinese: 桂林的景色以“青山，碧水，美石，怪洞”爲特色。

definition: scholar's rock (one of the naturally-eroded, fantastically-shaped rocks put on display indoors or in gardens in China)
jade/jade and stone/(fig.) the good and the bad
high-quality ink stonemade in Duanxi and Guangdong
